DIV1.HEAD: Alotments of Goods to be sold by the Company of Royal Adventurers of England Trading into Africa, at the African House in Broadstreet: by the Candle, on Thursday the 18th. of January 1665. at eight of the Clock in the Morning, The Buyer to have the Impost of what he Exports.

LIST.HEAD: LOTTS.
LIST.ITEM:
Barbado Sugars at Brewers Key.
No. 1 eleven butts
No. 2 eleven butts
No. 3 eleven butts
No. 4 eleven butts
No. 5 ten butts

No. 15 ten butts
No. 16 ten butts
No. 17 ten butts
No. 18 ten butts
No. 19 nine butts
No. 20 ten butts

No. 21 ten butts
Rated at 35 s. per Cent. to advance 6 d. To allow Tare 1 C. 1. 0 per butt.

Jamaco Sugars at Brewers Key.
No. 22 eleven casks
No. 23 eleven casks
No. 24 ten casks
No. 25 ten casks
No. 26 twelve pipes
two Hogsheads.
Rated at 40 s. per Cent. to advance 6 d.
Tare
1 C. 0 00 per Pipe.
0 2 14 per Hogshead.
0 3 14 per Punchion.

Cotton Wool at Brewers Key.
No. 27 eleven baggs to say four Ravel and 7 vine at 5 d. ½ per l.
No. 28 twenty one baggs to say three Ravel and 18 vine at 5 d.
No. 29 eleven baggs to say seven Ravel 4 vine at 5. d. ½.
No. 30 Thirty two baggs twenty four Ravel 8 vine at 6 d. per l.

No. 31 seven baggs—vine at 5 d.
Rated as aforegoing to advance ¼ d. per l. to allow 4 per Cent. Tare, and the usual treat.

Hides at Brewers Key.
No. 32 Three thousand six hundred and fifty.
No. 33 Three thousand six hundred and fifty.
Rated at 30 s. per Cent. waight, to advance 6 d. to take them as the rise withall faults.

Grana-dittio Wood at Brewers Key.
No. 34 About seventy waight, Rated at —

Bees Wax at Pinners Hall.
No. 35 About thirty six hundred waight.
No. 36 About thirty six hundred waight.
Rated at 5 per Cent. to advance 12 d.

Diapers for Tabling and Napkins at the African House.
No. 37 One hundred forty seven Suite and an half.
No. 38 One hundred forty seven Suite and an half.
Rated at 42 s. per Suite, to adaance 6 d.
